title: Lucians outfits are clearly the same color.

replies.body: how many shades will we get? could it be ... _**50**_

> [{quoted}](name=warpenguin555,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=qOEGLvUZ,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-04-07T13:31:42.127+0000)
>
> how many shades will we get? could it be ... _**50**_

noouu DX

haha

I see purple :D (awesome art btw) {{champion:103}}

I get this joke. It started on fb about 2 months ago when reporters proved that some people see shades of colors differently compared to others. Just like scientists have also proved that men see color different compared to women, but then i guess it's for everybody. And it's not just shades obviously, it could be this and you could see a completely different color.

And a shout out for all those colorblind out there. I somehow have a bunch of them on my friends list, makes me feel like shit ;l being an artist 'n all, i feel they're srsly missin' out on a bunch of potential.

An example:

http://www.deviantart.com/art/Vocaloid-Duke-of-Purple-178088138

This is either,
Magenta,
violet,
pink,
blue, 
or just plain.. Well, purple 
(Or neon purple, if you notice the contrast.)
And in rare cases, gold.

To me it simply looks like a neon purple.
What do you see?

(Not sure why people down voted this..)

I see a damn good art piece.

Looks like purple with a shade of pink... is that magenta? I forget :/
Just about, it's definitely a lighter shade so i suppose it is. Surprised you spotted it.
You listed a bunch of shades of purple/pink and I honestly dont know the difference between them. BUT ITS NOT BLUE
where can i get this yellow witchcraft?!
